I'm looking to book a hotel in Paris for May 1st to May 5th.
Can you suggest a hotel that's under 210? If there are a few choices, go for the one with the highest rating.
Please give me the hotel's name, rating, price range. Also, can you add an event called "Booking hotel {hotel_name}" to my calendar on April 25th 2024, and set the location to the hotel's address? Just to remind me to book ahead of time. Thanks!

First, I need to determine the current year to accurately set the date for the calendar event. 

Then, I will search for hotels in Paris that meet the criteria and get their names, ratings, and price ranges.

Finally, I will add a "Booking hotel {hotel_name}" event on April 25th of the current year to the user's calendar.

I need to find an alternative way to search for hotels in Paris from May 1st to May 5th, 2024 within a budget of $210. I will use the "search" function with relevant keywords to get information about hotel booking services or websites that might help.
